mapper.insert: insert into user values(null, #{userName}, #{year}, #{dept}, #{major}, #{password}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update user set userName = #{userName}, year = #{year}, dept = #{dept}, major = #{major}, updateTime = now() where id = #{id}
update user set password = #{password}, updateTime = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, userName, year, dept, major, password from user where id = #{id}
